nodes.excerpt: With https://www.channeltools.io, you can bulk invite all members of a Slack team, or a channel, to another channel. It also helps you quickly export all members from a channel. It comes with handy utility commands for clearing the screen and picking a random user
nodes.title: Channel Tools for Slack - Invite and export all channel or team members on Slack
nodes.author: Jai Pandya

nodes.excerpt: Know how your team is feeling every day, spot trends and take action. Troopr Check-ins for team mood is easy to set up, works completely in Slack, asynchronously and anonymously. Great way to care for your remote team.
nodes.title: Slack Mood Check-in by Troopr - Know how your team is feeling everyday & spot trends
nodes.author: Rashmi Gupta

nodes.excerpt: Start Google Meet instantly with one command right inside Slack. Use â€˜/meetâ€™ to set up a meeting, start it and send invitations. All at once. Works in personal DMs, group DMs and channels. Yes, this does one thing and does it really well ğŸš€

nodes.excerpt: Whatis is the easiest way to manage your team's internal terminology, jargon, project names, and acronyms. Increase your teamâ€™s efficiency, decentralize knowledge management, and make onboarding easier for new employees - without leaving Slack!
nodes.title: Whatis - Manage & organize your team's knowledge straight from Slack
nodes.author: Mitchell Friedman

nodes.excerpt: Do you work 10+ hours without taking breaks? You're not alone. Work breaks are simple and powerful yet we skip them because they're boring â € Cuely uses behavior design, positive psychology and social support to make it fun so you can stay well and feel happier
nodes.title: Cuely - 1-min guided exercises to stay well all day with reminders
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Our new Slack App: Bring Process Street into Slack to manage and automate all your workflows in one place. Handle tasks, forms and approvals in a few taps, without needing to leave Slack. Process Street makes your team's recurring work fun, fast and faultless.
nodes.title: Process Streetâ€™s Slack App - Manage and automate your recurring work in a single place

nodes.excerpt: Spark friendly competition with your team and boost morale, from Slack! People take turns drawing and guessing prompts. The faster you guess, the more points you get. Great for before a meeting, a Thursday social, or just taking a break. Up to 12 people.
nodes.title: Doodle - Pictionary, for Slack.
nodes.author: James Quinn

nodes.excerpt: Slack Connect allows you to send direct messages to people outside your company, simplifying the way you work with partners. Use this feature to seamlessly schedule meetings, sign documents and quickly collaborate on important tasks without ever leaving Slack.
nodes.title: Slack Connect Direct Messages - DM anyone outside your company from Slack
nodes.author: Sam Evans

nodes.excerpt: Stop interrupting with @channel! Usually anyone can answer so why do we keep distracting everyone? Tellspin makes it easy to create schedules / escalation policies for Slack. Share the load with your team members with built-in user groups/@mentions.
nodes.title: Tellspin - Automatic user group / @mention rotation in Slack
nodes.author: Dan Willoughby

nodes.excerpt: Alertly is your personalized slack bot for getting JIRA alerts. Set up important reminders, which are actionable and personalized so that the right person gets notified, all from Slack!
nodes.title: Alertly.io - Your personalized slack bot for JIRA alerts
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: We're the #1 weekend co-working club for bootstrappers to stay motivated, get helpful feedback and ship your project faster. Live sessions Saturdays 10am-5pm GMT & US Central time with a dedicated host, run over Slack & Zoom. Plus 100+ software discounts. ğŸ¤¯
nodes.title: Weekend Club - The weekend co-working club for bootstrappers to ship faster
nodes.author: Charlie Ward

nodes.excerpt: Custom Reactions - make your day-to-day communication more fun with custom-made emojis & reactions for your Slack/Discord! Immortalize all the inside jokes, brilliant puns, funny moments - all for a price of frappucino!
nodes.title: Custom Reactions - Custom Slack & Discord emoji reactions for the whole team
nodes.author: Blendor Sefaj

nodes.excerpt: Doppler Share is an easy way to share one-off secrets in a simple end-to-end encrypted way where the links auto-expire after a certain number of views and days.
nodes.title: Doppler Share - Share one-off secrets with end-to-end encryption ğŸ¤«
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Visualize your team's recurring tasks and processes in Slack. Build visual workflows using drag and drop interface and run the workflows to get a bird's eye view into your recurring processes. Sign up with Slack and run your first workflow in <1 min!
nodes.title: Finisher - Build visual streamlined workflows for your team in Slack
nodes.author: George Hannes

nodes.excerpt: OneBar is a shared Q&A knowledge base for your team. With our new Chrome Extension, you can access OneBar answers in any web app you use. Improve your sales responses in Gmail, speed up case resolution in Intercom, or even optimize prospecting on LinkedIn.
nodes.title: OneBar for Chrome - Q&A knowledge base built into every app you use
nodes.author: Maxim Leonovich

nodes.excerpt: This is a collection of multiplayer speed-typing games to kill boredom in Slack workspaces and Discord servers.
nodes.title: Fastest Fingers for Slack and Discord - Multiplayer speed typing games for Slack and Discord
nodes.author: Olamilekan Ib

nodes.excerpt: Socialize with your coworkers through fun games right in your Slack workspace. It's free while we're in Beta! Games: - Spot the Faker: A game of accusations and deception - Medium Roast: Roast your colleagues (SFW) - Trivia: 50+ categories, 5k+ questions
nodes.title: Bored for Slack - Play social games with your coworkers on Slack

nodes.excerpt: Keeping up with Slack channels demands your attention and time! Let Grok do the comprehending with the power of GPT-3. Summarize any Slack Channel on-demand, in a daily digest, or when joining a channel.
nodes.title: Grok - Summarize Slack channels w/ GPT3
nodes.author: Tristan Pollock

nodes.excerpt: Rollcall makes it easy to organize remote meetings with people in any timezone. Add to Slack, create an agenda, schedule a timeframe and the Rollcall bot collects your standup in text, audio-only, screen share and video formats.
nodes.title: Rollcall - Asynchronous standup meetings in Slack.
nodes.author: Mike McMillan

nodes.excerpt: Statusly is a Slack bot that helps you automate your Slack status and DND/away settings with Powerful Routines. Sync your Google Calendar and Zoom Meetings with your custom routines. For more information visit https://statusly.app/.
nodes.title: Statusly - Automate Slack status, DND based on your daily routines ğŸ¤–
nodes.author: Sanjith Kanagavel

nodes.excerpt: A community of once rejected YC founders to share experiences, discuss less tedious ways to get funding, and alternate options to grow their business. Join to connect and learn with a group of motivated founders!
nodes.title: rally - A community of rejected YC founders
nodes.author: Troy Osinoff

nodes.excerpt: Axel is a virtual assistant who helps you develop a culture of transparency and ownership in your team. You set up the right 1:1 and weekly check-in from templates in a few clicks. Our secret sauce: no need to add another tool, everything is done in Slack.
nodes.title: Axel - Powerful rituals to drive your team to success.
nodes.author: Chris Messina
